Filter and Process Single Cell Object

Filter and Process Single Cell Object#

The single cell data object is obtained after using the ParsePipeLine (split-pipe) v1.5 to analyse all sublibraries (8 sublibraries), combine them and get a combined and complete analysed object. To create the single cell object the coun_matrix, all_genes, and cell_metadata of the combined object was used. After this only the sample at2_ep was selected and further processed and filtered.

Parameters:

  • Minimum number of genes per cell: 300 genes

  • Maximum number of genes per cell: 7500 genes

  • Minimum number of cells expressing a gene: 3 cells

  • 0.03 < Percentage of mitochondrial genes < 0.18

  • 500 < Number of genes per count < 3500

  • Number of neighbours for analysis: 100

  • Number of PCs for analysis: 30

Deleted genes:

  • MALAT1 gene was deleted from dataset (Standard practice with single cell data)

  • Mitochondrial genes were removed.

  • ENSG- undefined genes were removed.

sc_plot_and_embed(
    sc.pl.violin,
    "preprocess1",
    at2_h_lp_filt,
    ['n_genes_by_counts', 'total_counts', 'percent_mito','GenesPerUMI'],
    jitter=0.4,
    groupby="sample",
    caption="QC metrics across samples.",
    kind="scanpy"
)

QC metrics across samples.

sc.pp.neighbors(at2_h_lp_filt, n_neighbors=100, n_pcs=25)
sc.tl.umap(at2_h_lp_filt, min_dist = 0.25, n_components = 2)
sc.tl.leiden(at2_h_lp_filt, flavor="igraph",resolution=2)
sc.tl.dendrogram(at2_h_lp_filt, groupby = "leiden")
#sc.pl.umap(at2_h_lp_filt,color=['leiden'], legend_fontsize=8)

sc_plot_and_embed(
    sc.pl.umap,
    "leiden1",
    at2_h_lp_filt,
    color=['leiden'],
    legend_fontsize=8,
    caption="Leiden clustering after filtering and processing.",
    kind="scanpy"
)

Leiden clustering after filtering and processing.

for res in [0.02, 0.5, 2.0]:
    sc.tl.leiden(
        at2_h_lp_filt, key_added=f"leiden_res_{res:4.2f}", resolution=res, flavor="igraph"
    )
#sc.pl.umap(
#    at2_h_lp_filt,

#    legend_loc="on data",
#)

sc_plot_and_embed(
    sc.pl.umap,
    "leiden3",
    at2_h_lp_filt,
    color=["leiden_res_0.02", "leiden_res_0.50", "leiden_res_2.00"],
    legend_loc="on data",
